name: Circle Pong: Ubiquity
description:
Play Pong alone within the realms of a single circle.
The further you get, the more challenges will be thrown in your way.
Compete online and rank among the leaderboard.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:
Right Arrowkey or D to paddle clockwise 
Left Arrowkey or A to move the paddle counter-clockwise
Escape to pause game
Hold over the names of challenges to see more information

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Credits:
Music done by Morgone
SFX done by Beep Yeah!
Additional voice effects done with FakeYou 
Unity WebGL template by Sean
